sentences.en: Austrian voters went to the polls this weekend to elect a successor to the President.
sentences.cn: 奥地利选民这周末去投票中心选举下届总统。

sentences.en: He bequeaths his successor an economy that is doing quite well.
sentences.cn: 他给继任者留下了发展势头非常不错的经济。

sentences.en: He gave over charge of his office to his successor today.
sentences.cn: 他今天向继任者交接了工作.

sentences.en: He had bowed out gracefully when his successor had been appointed.
sentences.cn: 他在继任者被任命后体面地引退了。

sentences.en: He set out several principles that he hopes will guide his successors.
sentences.cn: 他制定出了几条原则,希望能指导其继任者。

sentences.en: He was generous enough to congratulate his successor on his decision.
sentences.cn: 他十分大度地祝贺他的继任者做出了决定。

sentences.en: His chauffeur-driven car and company mobile phone will be handed on to his successor.
sentences.cn: 他那辆配有专职司机的轿车和公司手机将转交给他的继任者。

sentences.en: His successor died after only 15 months in office.
sentences.cn: 他的继任者就任仅15个月就去世了。

sentences.en: I’m sure she will be a worthy successor (= someone who is very good and deserves to be someone’s successor ) .
sentences.cn: 我确信她会是个当之无愧的接班人。

sentences.en: I’m sure she will be a worthy successor (= someone who is very good and deserves to be someone’s successor).
sentences.cn: 我确信她会是个当之无愧的接班人。

sentences.en: It is my intention to remain in my position until a successor is elected.
sentences.cn: 我的打算是继续呆在岗位上，直到选出继任者。

sentences.en: Mr. Olsen has always avoided anointing any successor.
sentences.cn: 奥尔森先生总是回避指定继任者。

sentences.en: Our defeat may be the preface to our successor's victory.
sentences.cn: 我们的失败可能是我们后继者获胜的开端.

sentences.en: Sokagakkai was able to hand-pick his successor.
sentences.cn: 创价学会可以仔细挑选其继任人。

sentences.en: The President's designated successor is his son.
sentences.cn: 总统的选定继承人是他的儿子。

sentences.en: The retiring warden delivered over the keys of the prison to his successor.
sentences.cn: 即将退休的监狱长把监狱的钥匙移交给继任者.

sentences.en: This successor was J . F . McLennan, the exact opposite of hispredecessor.
sentences.cn: 这个后继人,就是约-弗-麦克伦南, 他和他的先驱者正好相反.

sentences.en: When the chairman of Campbell's retired, McGovern was named as his successor.
sentences.cn: 坎贝尔公司的总裁退休后，麦戈文被选定为继任者。

sentences.en: When will they name a successor?
sentences.cn: 他们什么时候会任命继承人?

成功，成就；胜利；大获成功的人或事物

phrases.tran_cn: 法定继承人；合法继承人

trans.tran_cn: 接替的人或事物，继承人，继任者
trans.tran_en: someone who takes a job or position previously held by someone else
